actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 320 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of critical north-south highway corridor.

summary.text: Provides for the addition of 320 miles to the Federal Highway Interstate System and for the inclusion of a critical north-south highway corridor between Buffalo, New York, and Morgantown, West Virginia. Authorizes appropriations of $534,000,000 from the Highway Trust Fund to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 320 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of critical north-south highway corridor.
